question: Has your condition been diagnosed by your attending physician?
options: I do not have an attending physician

question: What is the reason for your application?
options: Evaluation for worsening of an existing condition or addition of a new condition
Evaluation for revision of current certification

question: State your role below:
options: I am applying for the issuance of my own certificate
I am an authorized representative of the person to whom the certificate will belong
I am the guardian of the person to whom the certificate will belong

question: Is there a court decision regarding judicial support or guardianship?
